Actions.Name: Check current balance
Actions.Description: This action will return you the current balance of your account.

Actions.Name: When you receive an incoming text message
Actions.Description: This operation triggers when you receive an incoming text message (SMS) on the number you bought from Infobip.

Actions.Name: Make a voice call
Actions.Description: This action will make an outbound voice call and read your message using text to speech synthesis.

Actions.Name: Send a text message (SMS)
Actions.Description: This action will send an outbound text message (SMS).
